recipe.title: Shaved Fennel and Arugula Salad
ingredients: 1 fresh fennel bulb, trimmed, halved, sliced paper-thin
1/3 cup oil-cured black olives, halved, pitted
instructions: Whisk first 3 ingredients in small bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing to taste with sea salt and pepper. Toss arugula, fennel, and olives in large bowl with dressing. Sprinkle cheese over.
Whisk first 3 ingredients in small bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing to taste with sea salt and pepper.
Toss arugula, fennel, and olives in large bowl with dressing. Sprinkle cheese over.
